sys_script_fix.name: test

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_017a335c1bc66190dd39ed3abc4bcb9a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>test</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[(function (minutes) {
	var createChoice = createChoiceFor('x_980836_car_bookings', 'starttime'),
		choiceValueExist = choiceValueExistFor('x_980836_car_bookings', 'starttime');

	while (minutes < 1440) {
		if (!choiceValueExist(minutes))
			createChoice(minutes);

		minutes += 15;
	}

	function createChoiceFor (name, element) {
		var secondsInMinutes = 60;
		var millisecondsInSeconds = 1000;

		return function (value) {
			var milliseconds = value * secondsInMinutes * millisecondsInSeconds;
			var gt = new GlideTime(milliseconds);

			return new global.GlideQuery('sys_choice')
				.insert({
					'name': name,
					'element': element,
					'value': '' + value,
					'language': 'en',
					'label': gt.getByFormat('hh:mm'),
					'inactive': false,
					'sequence': value,
				});
		};
	}

	function choiceValueExistFor (name, element) {
		return function (value) {
			return !new global.GlideQuery('sys_choice')
				.where('name', name)
				.where('element', element)
				.where('value', '' + value)
				.where('language', 'en')
				.selectOne([])
				.isEmpty();
		};
	}
})(0);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-03 11:08:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>017a335c1bc66190dd39ed3abc4bcb9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>test</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car" source="x_980836_car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_017a335c1bc66190dd39ed3abc4bcb9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-03 11:36:20</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
